resources.string: This application needs root access to operate. Click on the button below to request root access for this application, then grant root access with your preferred root solution. Since this app runs automatically whenever an SD Card is mounted, it will usually be executed shortly after boot. Hence, it is preferred to allow root access all the time to ensure that the app does not time out until root is granted manually. As soon as root access is set up, you can go on and remount your sd card. You can also hide the app icon from any launchers if you want to - usually it is not necessary to interact with this app once it has been set up.
